title: Memory Card Game
description: An Android app for playing a typical memory card game. Players must match 2 of the same cards, and they must find all matching pairs to win!

title: Workout Manager App
description: An android app that allows for user authentication through Firebase. Users can manage their exercises, where their data is stored in Cloud Firestore.

title: 3D Graphic Transformations
description: A program that allows basic transformations (translation, scaling, rotation) of a 3D object through keyboard interactions.

title: Graphing Simulator
description: A GUI application that allows users to create undirected graphs and simulate Chaitin's Algorithm for coloring nodes.

title: Shell Task Manager
description: A command-line interface that simulates a shell for task/process management, execution, and other features.

title: Discord Chatbot (Wynny)
description: A Discord chatbot that can send pictures of dogs and cats, tell jokes, recite poems, give fortunes, and much more!
